title.zh: 南昌：首次女性血友病集体检测
title.en: Nanchang: First Collective Female Hemophilia Testing

subtitle.zh: 南昌市血友病女性家属检测活动
subtitle.en: Nanchang Female Family Members Testing Activity

description.zh: 南昌市血之友公益协会的左国良带领7位有血友病家族史的女性，在中国江西南昌进行了第一次小规模的集体检测，迈出了模式探索的第一步。这次检测活动标志着我们在女性血友病携带者和患者筛查方面的重要进展，为后续大规模推广积累了宝贵经验。通过专业的检测流程和细致的服务，为参与女性提供了准确的健康评估。
description.en: Led by Zuo Guoliang from Nanchang Hemophilia Association, 7 women with family history of hemophilia underwent the first small-scale collective testing in Nanchang, Jiangxi, China, taking the first step in model exploration. This testing activity marks an important progress in female hemophilia carrier screening in China, accumulating valuable experience for subsequent large-scale promotion. Through professional testing procedures and meticulous service, accurate health assessments were provided to participating women.
